long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply save products online and be reminded when out shopping. 

Streamline your shopping experience with RainCheck by saving products from your favourite online stores when inusing Chrome and be reminded when out shopping with special offers and discounts. It’s time to say goodbye to missed deals, lost links and forgotten favourites.

RainCheck is EASY to use:
1. BROWSE PRODUCTS ONLINE: hover over any product you’d like to save and click on the RainCheck start to add it to the app.
2. BUILD YOUR PERSONAL WISHLIST: access your saved items in the app and share your list with family and friends.
3. GET REMINDERS & DEALS: best of all… get reminders and special offers on your saved items when out shopping.

It’s that easy. Install the RainCheck Chrome Extension now and start building your personal shopping wishlist today!
